Description:
PANORAMIC BAY VIEWS - FORESHORE
The bay vista from this seaside home is a display of natural beauty that has to be seen. Situated opposite foreshore on a large block of approx.. 756 sq.m. is this split-level 3 bedroom home. Featuring upstairs -
- Open plan living/meals and kitchen area
- Dishwasher, stainless steel oven and gas hotplates
- Floating floor
- Split-system airconditioner
- 3 bedrooms all with BIRs
- Modern family bathroom with double shower
- Sliding door from living to wide balcony
- Magic water views from wherever you sit
- Downstairs -
- Rumpus room/4th bedroom
- Laundry combined with extra shower and toilet
- Storage room
The property also has a single garage, concrete driveway and area under home, at rear of property is gates for easy access to laneway at back and established gardens. Corinella is a popular destination for holidaymakers and keen fisherman with a 24 hour boat ramp and jetty and is very close to a safe sandy swimming beach and also offers scenic walking tracks to meander along. Major shopping centre and Phillip Island approx.. 25 mins and easy
commute to CBD with dual lane highway.
We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable. However, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective purchasers are advised to carry out their own investigations. www.1stre.com.au

Description:
LEVEL LOT ON PORTVIEW - EASTERN SHORES, GRANTVILLE
Get in quick to secure one of the few blocks left in the Eastern Shores estate in Grantville on this flat cleared site which is titled and ready to build your home. The estate is very popular with buyers wanting the convenience of walking to all the township services, shops and most of all the beach! With a bushland reserve on one side of the estate and the luxury of being able to keep the car in the garage while you mosey on around the corner to the shops, the land has been very popular. Grantville is thriving and there are few opportunities left to pick a level lot and build your home on so don't pass this opportunity up!

Description:
EXQUISITE FAMILY HOME!!
This spectacular home offers absolute luxury and a warm family feel for those who recognise the best things in life.
Designed for easy living and a coastal feel, this home is so much what the modern family seeks….
The open plan living, dining and balcony at the front of the property and the back balcony offers great bay views, all blend together to form an excellent year – round entertaining space.
Three spacious bedrooms with built-ins, 2 bathrooms, main with walk – in robe.
Modern kitchen with loads of bench space and storage.
Study nook on entrance, light filled rooms all through the home, large laundry.
Remote control garage used has a games room with access to the home.
Also large Garage (Boat Shed) 14ML x 6MW – Door Height - 2,820, so great for boat and caravan, with ample storage and work shop and bathroom, Solar Panels.
There is a water tank, easy care gardens, Level fenced North facing yard, with loads of room for parking.
Only a few minutes away from the Corinella boat ramp, walking track, General Store.
If you are unable to attend a scheduled open please call to arrange your private inspection.

Description:
Renovator, Renovator
This home on approx. 736m2 block with all town services, town water, sewerage and natural gas. A side entrance to a spacious backyard and rear access with double gates. The home has 4 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, 2 toilets, separate lounge, new natural gas fired wood heater, timber kitchen, gas stove, pantry, island bench and combustion wood stove. 20 Solar panels, vinyl cladding around the home which never needs painting. Large outdoor pergola with paving, 2 garden sheds plus another 3 bay shed. The property does need work, but has huge potential so ideal for a handyman.

Description:
OPEN HOME CANCELLED SATURDAY 8TH JULY 2017
This gorgeous, character-filled home is ideal for the first home buyer, downsizer or investor alike. With 3 sizable bedrooms, 2 living areas, a renovated bathroom and large open kitchen all situated on an 850sm (approx.) block with outdoor entertaining area and room for the kids to run and play.
The kitchen has ample bench space and storage, with new stainless steel stove and overlooks the dining and second living areas. Main living area is spacious and warm with a cozy open fire and split system air conditioning. All 3 bedrooms are well proportioned and complemented by built-in robes. The central family bathroom is funky and updated with modern shower.
Outside is a large backyard with dog run, 2 car garage and garden shed. Outdoor entertaining will be a breeze in the pergola invite all the friends and family around.
Please note: Photo ID is required for all inspections.

Description:
Coastal charm
This charming home has a genuinely peaceful atmosphere and includes two living areas and 3 bedrooms with built in robes. Heating and cooling are taken care of by the split system while the coonara and ceiling fans adds to the cosy living. The outdoors features a large 2 bay garage, carport and plenty of open space for parking. The established trees add to the feel and there is a great little gazebo for entertaining or relaxing. This wonderful property is perfectly suited to the first home owner looking for an affordable entry into the property market. Or maybe you are looking for a weekender? Either way be quick and make the most of everything the area has to offer.

Description:
Corinella..Victoria's Best Kept Secret..50m to Waterline
If you have ever wanted to live next to the sea in a beautiful natural setting, or wanted to take an early morning stroll along serene seaside walking tracks that go for miles and miles then slip your boat into calm clean ocean fed waters and just relax while you catch a snapper or a brace of whiting for breakfast and do all this just seconds from your front door - and still only be an hour and half drive from Melbourne, then the Historic Town of Corinella is for you ! It is truly Victoria's Best Kept Secret ! Come down and have a look and see for yourself, The Coastal views are amazing! Named The jewel of the Western Port region, Corinella enjoys a warmer average temperature due to being surrounded on three sides by the waters of Western Port bay, the warmer water temperature keeps the winters frosts away and keeps the climate in Corinella milder than the ocean facing Phillip Island. This favoured two story property with French Island and coastal water views, features 3 good size bedrooms all with B.I.R's, open plan living with full length deck for entertaining, modern spacious kitchen, split system heating and cooling PLUS downstairs comprising of rumpus/games/guest room, laundry and second toilet, remote door garage, and WOW! a separate BOATS garage. Enjoy fishing from the 24 hour boat ramp with BBQ facilities, caravan park, tennis courts, shop and bus service. This property is realistically priced for a genuine sale.

Beautiful building block with potential bay views
A Fantastic opportunity to acquire this lovely allotment located within easy walking distance to the wonderful coastal township of Grantville where local shops include a newsagency, cafes, doctors surgery, chemist, wineries and easy access to public transport.
Block is approximately 587m2 in size and slightly undulating in nature; this block offers fantastic opportunity and potential. Be quick to call for this great block.

Description:
Hop Skip and a Jump to the water
Wonderful opportunity here to acquire this beautiful block situated very close walking distance to the Foreshore, Pier and also the lovely back beach in lovely Corinella. Stroll around the corner to get your morning paper at the General Store/Post Office and feel like you are on holiday every day of the year. Corinella is renowned for beautiful Westernport and French Island views, fishing and terrific walking/bicycle path network. All can be enjoyed without the frenzy of holiday traffic and overcrowding, its still a well - kept secret but the area is growing in appeal to both holiday makers and permanents. Approx 643 m2 with a frontage of 17.68 m x 42.7/36.68 metre depth. This block is one of only a few left in this dress circle location in The Moorings Estate and represents great value. Just listed for the summer period, its a cool buy so call now!

Description:
Caldermeade Dairy Farm & Cafe
Ideally located fronting the South Gippsland Highway, this dairy and tourist enterprise offers the astute investor the opportunity of a consistent income from dairy farming and hospitality.
182 ha - 451 acres freehold
145 ha - 359 acres leasehold
Extensive South Gippsland Hwy frontage.
50 unit modern rotary dairy with a dedicated viewing area.
Fully licenced café including a supply licence to supply liquor on the licenced premise for consumption off premise.
82Ml of bore water, 50+ Ml of C Class water supplied under pressure plus connection to farm effluent system and an additional 50Ml of temporary bore water.
High production Ultra & Matrix perennial ryegrass with clover under the irrigation.
Having previously had a permit for the development of a cheese factory, Caldermeade Farm & Café is a unique opportunity to capitalise on the growing market of paddock to plate dining.
For further information please contact us or Shane McIntyre, Colliers International 0429 557 070

Description:
Seaside Cottage Delight
Just a moments walk to the beach this beautifully presented 2 bedroom cottage awaits you. Nestled in a quiet street surrounded by quality homes this property offers the buyer many special features. The smell of the sea air, the sound of kookaburra's and the beauty of the Lorikeets, galahs and other seafaring birds is enchanting. Add to this the 24 hour jetty and lovely walks along the beach this area is simply magical.
The home has been totally renovated and recently upgraded with everything practically brand new including front and back decking, carpets and timber floating floors, split system air conditioning and freshly painted through-out. This property offers a garage and garden shed with room for the boat or caravan and all set on a good sized block of 594m2. Be quick to inspect this beauty.

Beach Side Baby with Bay Views
Sitting elevated right on the water overlooking the beach, Westernport Bay and French Island is this beautiful home that offers a blend of modern design with old fashioned charm. Extensively renovated throughout this home offers a spacious lounge and dining room, new modern kitchen with large meal/family area. 3 spacious bedrooms, modern tiled bathroom, magnificent timber flooring throughout and a rear decked entertainment area. This property offers plenty of parking for the boat, caravan and extra holiday visitors. This is a unique opportunity to purchase for investment, holiday home or permanent living, be quick on calling!

Description:
STAGE 2 THE CAPE
Stage 2 blocks released at The Cape
The Cape, Ocean Views & Direct Beach Access.
Imagine your dream home, a short stroll from one of the region's most spectacular beaches. Imagine a modern community in a stunning location, conducive to a healthy, active lifestyle. Whether you're out catching the surf every morning, walking, cycling or exercising those green thumbs, The Cape offers a lifestyle many only dare to dream about.
A unique residential project that features 7.5-star plus energy efficient homes, The Cape is a contemporary village designed to co-exist with the environment. A haven for nature lovers, The Cape is committed to restoring and protecting native natural habitats in the area. Each home offers high standards of modern creature comforts, livability and sustainability, with 10,000 litres of rainwater storage and storm water collection providing year round water security. Meanwhile, solar power generates clean energy for every home throughout The Cape.
Residents also have access to a specially designed community food garden, the centerpiece of the Village Square. Other facilities include an exciting Community Centre, sports precinct as well as walking and cycling paths that meander through 40 hectares of beautiful landscape. At The Cape, live in harmony with nature on a piece of paradise you can call your own.

Description:
HALF ACRE WITH SERVICES IN BEAUTIFUL CORINELLA
This ½ acre, (2007 m2) block offers so much privacy and enough space for a large country home with room for extra shedding if required. Flanked by mature trees at the front boundary there is a sense of privacy from the road and other neighbours.
The land will be connected to sewerage, mains power and water at the front of the property and titles are expected by Feb, 2017 approx.
Potential sea views exist to both the Corinella main beach and back beach should you build an elevated home. Corinella has a General Store/Post Office, Bowling Club and a Pier with a 24 hour boat ramp.
This will not last long inspect today.

Description:
Young, Modern 4 Bedroom Home
Located in Pioneer Bay on a service road sits this spacious approx. 4.5 year old hardiplank home. The family friendly 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom home caters for everyone with an appealing open floor plan. The home features an oversized 7.5 m carport under the roof line plus a wide covered deck running length of the home with wide merbau boards and marine grade balcony wiring. This is a great place for relaxing outside overlooking the garden.
This spacious home is easy to keep clean with a mixture of ceramic tiles and floating floors. There are built in robes in all the bedrooms and an ensuite bathroom services the master bedroom.
The home is heated and cooled by a large reverse cycle air conditioner and has an induction cook top with under-bench oven, dishwasher and range hood to the kitchen. The home also has under floor insulation making it cozy all year round.
The gardens are neat and well laid out with room for children to play and is safely fenced for both children and pets. There is plenty of off-street parking and the home is shielded from the highway via a large barrier fence and wide nature strip. All the hard work has been done to establish this home including expansive concrete driveway and garden beds. Investors will enjoy the appeal of a 4 bedroom home and permanents and holiday makers alike will be comfortable here in this young spacious home.
The house is move in ready and the Vendor is flexible with settlement. The boardwalk links the area to the foreshore area and the popular Gurdies bushland park is across the highway from this home.

Description:
SPECTACULAR VIEWS – SOPHISTICATED BEACH HOME!
Upon entering this beautifully presented home, you will feel the absolute flow of open plan living, together with a panoramic view of Westernport Bay. Make no mistake, this is a fantastic property, which will tick all the boxes for a wide range of buyers, whether they be families, professionals or investors looking for something special.
Finished with the highest attention to detail throughout, this delightful home has a captivating street appeal with an enchanting front veranda.
Downstairs features a large kitchen with ample bench space, and a gas range. A carpeted formal lounge with split system, and tiled family dining opening out to a private outdoor covered entertaining area and large garden. Two bedrooms and bathroom with shower, vanity and separate toilet and laundry complete downstairs.
The master suite is upstairs with double built-ins, and access to the wrap-around deck. A parent’s retreat with air-con, full bathroom with shower, vanity and toilet, also have deck access.
An undercover carport for 2 cars and a huge 8x5 garage suitable for large caravans/boats or tradesmen, together with access from both Arlington court and Hamilton street complete this 538 approx allotment.
With the foreshore at the end of the street, walking tracks & 24 hour boat ramp only minutes away, this home delivers a premium coastal lifestyle. Easy access to the General Store, park, community centre, tennis courts, primary school, kindergarten, the new hub, all bus services & only 90 minutes from Melbourne CBD.
If you are unable to attend a scheduled Open House, please phone for a private viewing.
Insights: 2 ARLINGTON COURT, Corinella VIC 3984 was last sold in 2017 and 11 other 3 bedroom house in Corinella have recently been sold.

Address: Lot 21 Grantville-Glen Alvie Road Grantville VIC 3984
Description:
Final Stage of Eastern Shores
Lot 21 Grantville-Glen Alvie Road, 791m2
Eastern Shores Estate last and FINAL land release is underway with Titles expected early 2018. The land enjoys views towards the sea and the woodland nature reserve next to the estate. Land sizes vary and the land whilst mostly flat has some elevated lots which will capture views. This is the final stage of land release in Grantville at present so get in early to secure your lot. Eastern Shores is located minutes stroll away from all the shops and services in Grantville which include a Post Office, Newsagency, Council Offices, Medical Centre, Ambulance station and Chemist. There are a number of Cafes and fast food outlets and a Bakery. Grantville is approx. 20 mins from San Remo, 30 mins from Wonthaggi and Cowes and approx. 35 mins from Cranbourne and Pakenham. There is an excellent new Early Childhood campus beside the popular Bass Valley Primary School and there are multiple Secondary School options in the locality. A V- Line Bus runs regularly to Melbourne and beyond into Gippsland. The township is growing rapidly but land is running out just as fast!
Deposit of $500 is due upon signing contracts with the balance of 10% deposit within 21 days. The balance will be due within 14 days of the Titles being issued by the Land Titles office.
Contact Liz Leahy for more information on 0487 022 099

Address: 110 Murphys Road Lang Lang East VIC 3984
Description:
Elandra Park Estate " Over 150 Versatile Acres
Prestigious, private and beautifully composed, Elandra Park Estate offers 150 acres of complete versatility. Gippslands prime grazing land with unsurpassed views.
Rarely does a property deliver such a beautiful balance of refined interior dimensions and a garden backdrop defined by northern light, spectacular depth and serene greenery - This fabulous home does so - unforgettably. The formal elegance of the substantial sitting room with high ceilings flows to the enormous, light-filled living and dining areas. Also Boasting a modern kitchen with large pantry and a superb wall of windows out to the terraced entertaining area above the manicured gardens, swimming pool and vista views. A light and bright feel advances the family appeal of the home where four bedrooms and three bathrooms include a luxuriously large main bedroom with walk-in robes and en-suite. Large gas fireplace, plus fully integrated connectivity, including in ceiling and outdoor speakers. Further enhanced by a double carport and plenty of additional parking, this exceptional home enjoys an elite setting.
Fully established and designed to be easily managed, Elandra Park delights in providing animals, owners and guests with only the very best including fertile pastures, loads of new shedding and even your own quarry. There is also a professional undercover Veterinary crush on a concrete pad with large work area, metal panel stockyards and 3 water tanks
Inside
• Fully renovated, the four-bedroom home, the master offering a sleek en-suite with stunning views
2nd bathroom with double basins servicing the kids and guests
• Large lounge with Jetmaster fireplace and picture windows to frame the views
• Modern kitchen with European appliances, adjoining family/meals area
• Sheltered veranda overlooking a sparkling in-ground pool and majestic vistas beyond
Outside
- 16 fully fenced large cattle paddocks with electrified fencing, linked by laneways
all with reticulated water
- 11 dams including one spring fed dam
- 7 horse paddocks with electric offsets and lighting, post and rail and sighter wire
- 7 smaller stud paddocks
- 60m x 25m fenced dressage arena
- 3 stables contained within 48' x 36' colourbond barn with concrete floor, wash bay, tack room, laundry, feed area
- 2 large machinery sheds
- Professional undercover Veterinary crush on concrete pad with large area, metal panel stockyards
- 3 water tanks
- Yellow sand quarry
- Remnant natural bushland
- beautiful rolling country with distant views to Western Port and the Gippsland hills
- Grand driveway leading up to the residence makes a fitting entrance to this magnificent property
Set up for ease of management, this acclaimed cattle and horse stud is only a short drive to local shops and popular coastal resorts like Phillip Island. Located on 10minutes from the excitement of the recent news headline of the Koo Wee Rup Airport located on the corner of Caldermeade and Lang Lang the opportunities are limitless.
Approximately an hour's drive or train ride to the centre of Melbourne, whether you run this as a farm, weekend retreat or lifestyle property, the hard work has been done for a life of luxury.

Description:
MODERN BRICK FAMILY HOME NEAR WATER!!!
Positioned in a quiet yet convenient location this young brick veneer home offers separate living area, split-system air conditioner, open plan kitchen/family/meals area with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, sliding door out to paved entertainment area, 3 good size bedrooms all with built in robes and ceiling fans, master having en suite and has a good size family bathroom. The double remote garage has a back roller door for easy access to backyard for trailer. Plenty of room for children and pets with fenced off yard. Stroll to the water, local shop, community centre, v-line and school bus stop, tennis courts, lawn bowls and playground. If you love fishing there is a 24 hour boat ramp only a couple of minutes away. The local primary school and kindergarten are approx.. 5 mins, major shopping centre and Phillip Island approx.. 25 mins. Easy commute to CBD with dual lane highway.
We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable. However, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective purchasers are advised to carry out their own investigations. www.1stre.com.au
Property Code: 401987345
